thread.title: The Jewel - an appropriate name!
thread.title_full: The Jewel - an appropriate name! - Review of The Jewel facing Rockefeller Center, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: FRANKC9246
title: The Jewel - an appropriate name!
text: You will never find another hotel in mid-town that is as convenient, modern, clean, with such great service, at such a moderate price. It's going to be my go-to hotel in New York City. We were able to walk to most of the mid-town sights, stores and restaurants in just a few minutes. Within blocks of St. Patrick's cathedral, Rockefeller Center, Saks, Bloomingdale's, Central Park, and Radio City.
